datatypeProperties.comment: The date, time, date time or other date time value for a complete specified period of time expressed as a specific month, a specific week, etc.
The indication of whether or not this specified period is continuous.
A textual description for the type of transportation waste recovery disposal process.
A duration, expressed as text, for this specified period.
The date, time, date time or other date time value for the end of this available period of time.
The code specifying the end day of the week for this specified period.
The indication of whether or not the start and end dates are included in this specified period.
A name or symbol, expressed as text, of a radioactive radionuclide.
The indication of whether or not an entity is open during this specified period.
A code specifying a purpose for this field crop.
A code specifying a season for this trade product.
A sequence number for these specified personal effects.
The code specifying the flexibility of the start date of this specified period.
The date, time, date time or other date time value for the start of this available period of time.
The code specifying the start day of the week for this specified period.
A code specifying a type of MDH health indication.

objectProperties.comment: The number of days in this specified period.
A measure of the length of time for this specified time period such as hours, days, weeks, months, years.
The measure of the maximum length of time for this specified period, such as hours, days, weeks, months, years.
The measure of the minimum length of time for this specified period, such as hours, days, weeks, months, years.
The number of nights in this specified period.

referencedBy.comment: The specified period when access to this binary file is available.
A period of validity specified for this referenced document.
A period of time associated with this document clause.
The specified period within which this referenced document may be accepted.
The period within which this document line is effective.
A period of validity specified for this referenced document.
A period of validity specified for this referenced document.
The actual period of time during which this transport event occurred.
The specified period of laycan time during which this transport event occurs.
The scheduled period of time specified for the occurrence of this transport event.
The period within which this document line is effective.
